paragraphs.text: I was having a conversation with a friend whom I’ve known almost my whole life. He sent me a picture of a slam book entry that I wrote for him. Among the other cheesy shit, I wrote my ambition was ‘To become a husband to my wife’! Lol! While that was one of my lofty goals at the time, my main lofty goal…

paragraphs.name: 2f3f
paragraphs.text: This seemingly innocuous question can in some instances be just that — but as we grow, move towards a more enlightened age, it seems offensive — especially if that question arises from the name, color of skin, or any of the disappointing prejudices we hold.

paragraphs.text: So, I’ve been running on and off for close to six years now. I used to run a few times a week — but only say 1–2 miles every time. It was alright — I liked the high it gave me, but I ran mostly to stay active, stay fit and hopefully without any abdominal fat. I failed the last…
